{{Infobox Berry |name = #51 Babiri |image = [[File:Babiri.png]] |caption = This Berry is very tough with a strong flavor. It was used to make medicine by people in the past. This Berry plant is very hardy and resistant, causing less mutations around it. |growtime = 18h 0m 0s |harvest = 36 berries |replant = 50% |points = 2,400 |flavor =
*25 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Babiri''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with 4 [[Shuca]] and 4 [[Charti]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0 - 2 hours || 2 hours - 4 hours 30 min || 4 hours 30 min - 9 hours || 9 hours - 18 hours || 18hours - 1 day 12 hours |- |

[[File:BabiriTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BabiriTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BabiriTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Babiri berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[Shuca]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Shuca]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Shuca]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Shuca]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Shuca]] |- | [[Charti]] || || [[Shuca]] || || [[Charti]] |- style="height: 26px;" | [[Charti]] || [[Charti]] || [[Charti]] || [[Charti]] || [[Charti]] |- | [[Charti]] || || [[Shuca]] || || [[Charti]] |- | [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] |}
